The Passionate damsel, or, The True miss of a man in which he sets forth a true sence of her sorrow ... to the tune of The vertue of the pudding.
1 broadside. : ill.
Printed for P. Brooksby ..., [London] : [ca. 1687]
In verse. Place and date of publication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints. Illustrated with 6 woodcuts. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
